name: Vasilis Gkatzelis
content: Vasilis Gkatzelis Vasilis Gkatzelis Home Research CV Vasilis Gkatzelis I am an associate professor of computer science at the College of Computing & Informatics of Drexel University and a member of the Drexel EconCS research group. I am also an affiliate researcher at Archimedes/Athena RC, Greece. Previous Appointments: Jan. 2024 -Jun. 2025 [sabbatical+part time appointment]: faculty visitor at Google Research in NYC Spring 2016: postdoc at UC Berkeley hosted by Christos Papadimitriou and Eric Friedman Fall 2015: research fellow at the Simons Institute for the Theory of Computing at UC Berkeley 2013-2015: postdoc at Stanford University hosted by Tim Roughgarden Education: PhD (2013): Courant Institute of New York University (advised by Richard Cole) Diploma (2007): Computer Engineering and Informatics of University of Patras Recent Conference Publications Procurement Auctions with Predictions: Improved Frugality for Facility Location (with E.
